column5: Got out to the shack on Edward Lake again.So glad I can go there.Sled is still not fixed yet but soon.Action not to bad still catching everything in the shack.Most lure presenatations all work.Lots of pike and the muskies wont leave me along.Lost a bunch of tackle.Weather is turning around now I think.Everyone is hoping for some melting to happen so we can get rid of the snow load and the slush so the ice can lift.Looking forward to hitting the trout holes soon but not complaining about catching fish in the shack which will get better pretty soon.Anybody looking for some spring ice fishing check out www.clarksresorts.com
Gotta be a tough life!! Thanks for the pic's! Bill
Thx Bill.hope to put some more pics up soon.hope some of this snow starts melting soon.

Looks like a great time ice fishing, leave a few in there for summer, ha! I'll be coming up to KC's to fish for a day before we fly out from Clark's on Cedar. Got any advice for first time on the Indian Chain in June?
There will be plenty left.Ive thrown back around 400 walleyes so far.lol.there should be fish close to camp.wayne will fill you in and I might be there.
